verses.verse: When the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H5394><s%>, and has cast out many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H2850><s%>, the Hittites, and the Girgashites <S%H1622><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> and mightier than you <S%H6099><s%>;

And when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H5221><s%>; you shall strike them <S%H2763><s%>, and utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> them <S%H3772><s%>; you shall make no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H2603><s%>, nor show mercy unto them:

Neither shall you make marriages <S%H2859><s%> with them <S%H1323><s%>; your daughter you shall not give <S%H5414><s%> unto his son <S%H1121><s%>, nor his daughter <S%H1323><s%> shall you take <S%H3947><s%> unto your son <S%H1121><s%>.

For they will turn away <S%H5493><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> me <S%H5647><s%>, that they may serve other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>: so will the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you <S%H8045><s%>, and destroy you suddenly <S%H4118><s%>.

But thus shall you deal <S%H6213><s%> with them <S%H5422><s%>; you shall destroy their altars <S%H4196><s%>, and break down <S%H7665><s%> their images <S%H4676><s%>, and cut down <S%H1438><s%> their groves <S%H842><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> their engraved images <S%H6456><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

For you are a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> you to be a special <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself <S%H5971><s%>, above all people that are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> did not set his love <S%H2836><s%> upon you <S%H977><s%>, nor choose you <S%H7230><s%>, because you were more in number than any people <S%H5971><s%>; for you were the fewest <S%H4592><s%> of all people <S%H5971><s%>:

But because the Lord <S%H3068><s%> loved <S%H160><s%> you <S%H8104><s%>, and because he would keep the oath <S%H7621><s%> which he had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, has the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondmen <S%H5650><s%>, from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he is God <S%H430><s%>, the faithful <S%H539><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, which keeps <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with them that love <S%H157><s%> him and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>;

And repays <S%H7999><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> him to their face <S%H6440><s%>, to destroy <S%H6><s%> them <S%H309><s%>: he will not be slack to him that hates <S%H8130><s%> him <S%H7999><s%>, he will repay him to his face <S%H6440><s%>.

You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to do them <S%H6213><s%>.

Why it shall come to pass <S%H6118><s%>, if you listen <S%H8085><s%> to these judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>, that the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> unto you the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and the mercy <S%H2617><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>:

And he will love <S%H157><s%> you <S%H1288><s%>, and bless you <S%H7235><s%>, and multiply you <S%H1288><s%>: he will also bless the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your womb <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%>, your corn <S%H1715><s%>, and your wine <S%H8492><s%>, and your oil <S%H3323><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows <S%H504><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep <S%H6629><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give you <S%H5414><s%>.
You shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> above all people <S%H5971><s%>: there shall not be male <S%H6135><s%> or female childless <S%H6135><s%> among you <S%H929><s%>, or among your cattle.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will take away <S%H5493><s%> from you all sickness <S%H2483><s%>, and will put <S%H7760><s%> none of the evil <S%H7451><s%> diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which you know <S%H3045><s%>, upon you <S%H5414><s%>; but will lay them upon all them that hate you <S%H8130><s%>.

And you shall consume <S%H398><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H5869><s%>; your eye shall have no pity <S%H2347><s%> upon them <S%H5647><s%>: neither shall you serve their gods <S%H430><s%>; for that will be a snare unto you <S%H4170><s%>.
If you shall say <S%H559><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>, These nations <S%H1471><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> than I <S%H349><s%>; how can <S%H3201><s%> I dispossess them <S%H3423><s%>?

You shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them <S%H2142><s%>: but shall well remember <S%H2142><s%> what the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and unto all Egypt <S%H4714><s%>;

The great <S%H1419><s%> temptations <S%H4531><s%> which your eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%>, and the signs <S%H226><s%>, and the wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and the mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and the stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, by which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%>: so shall the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%> of whom you are afraid <S%H3373><s%>.

Moreover the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> among them <S%H7604><s%>, until they that are left, and hide <S%H5641><s%> themselves from <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H6><s%>, be destroyed.

You shall not be afraid <S%H6206><s%> at <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>: for the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H1419><s%>, a mighty God <S%H410><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will put out <S%H5394><s%> those <S%H411><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by little <S%H4592><s%> and little <S%H4592><s%>: you may <S%H3201><s%> not consume <S%H3615><s%> them at once <S%H4118><s%>, lest the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> increase upon you <S%H7235><s%>.

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them unto you <S%H6440><s%>, and shall destroy <S%H1949><s%> them with a mighty <S%H1419><s%> destruction <S%H4103><s%>, until they be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>.

And he shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and you shall destroy <S%H6><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>: there shall no man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H8045><s%>, until you have destroyed them.

The engraved images <S%H6456><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%> shall you burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: you shall not desire <S%H2530><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> or gold <S%H2091><s%> that is on them <S%H3947><s%>, nor take it unto you <S%H3369><s%>, lest you be snared in it <S%H8441><s%>: for it is an abomination to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

Neither shall you bring <S%H935><s%> an abomination <S%H8441><s%> into your house <S%H1004><s%>, lest you be a cursed thing <S%H2764><s%> like it <S%H8262><s%>: but you shall utterly detest <S%H8262><s%> it <S%H8581><s%>, and you shall utterly abhor <S%H8581><s%> it <S%H2764><s%>; for it is a cursed thing.
